message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  What do you think?
Your offer was a bit imbalanced. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Let's compromise.  I'll take 70%, and you can have 30%. I'm willing to negotiate a bit more, but I don't think we can go much lower than this.
This is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the only fair option considering the circumstances. Take it or leave it.
